trial_type.Description: Manually annotated event categories (time points with agreement from at least 3 out of 5 annotaters); see Park et al. (2022) for more details on event regressors

Levels.pos_affect: Time points when the main character, Piper, appeared to be experiencing positive emotions (e.g., related to happiness, joy, excitement, etc.)
Levels.neg_affect: Time points when Piper appeared to be experiencing negative emotions (e.g., related to fear, suspense/tension, sadness, etc.)
Levels.parent_child: Time points when Piper and their mother were interacting
